messages.subject: leggo in pockets
messages.msgSnippet: ... out of the house). I never throw away stray Legos.  They have a bin.  I carry them  in my pocket until I can get to the bin.  It s pathological.
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>I LOVE to sort and organize (and get things
out of the house).

I never throw away stray Legos. They have a bin. I
carry them in my
pocket
until I can get to the bin. It's pathological.

Karen>>>>>>>>>>>>>

oh god! me too! I love you for saying this!
one time I sat down in my son's room and went through
the usual pile of leggo, spare change, old chewing gum
wrappers, marbles, garbage, electronic parts, papers,
items to return to the kitchen, items to return to my
office, items to return to the bathroom, etc. etc.
etc. in about 45 seconds flat, and his mouth dropped
open and he said "THAT is SCARY!"
Anna
